Description: Fragment (two pieces joined) of the body of a drab-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is grey-red in section and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Condition: fair (incomplete, two fragments joined - text worn and faded)
